bibl.title: William Spears and James McGough v King County. Subpoena
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

keywords.term: James Seavey Jame F. Cass James Peddic

div1.ab: Territory of Washington, Third Judicial District. | ss.
div1.p: In the name of the United States of America, you are hereby commanded to be and appear at the District Court for the Third Judicial District of Washington Territory, at Seattle, for the District aforesaid, at 3.30 o'clock in the afternoon of the 17th day of November A.D. 1883 then and there to give evience in a certain cause therein pending wherein Territory of Washington is Plaintiff and James McGough et. al. Defendant, and to remain in attendance on said Court from day to day thereafter until discharged and herein fail not at your peril.
div1.ab: Witness the Hon. Roger S Greene, Chief Justice of the Supreme Court of Washington Territory and Judge of said District Court, this 14th day of November AD 1883
James Seavey Clerk. By James Fleass Deputy.
No 3536 District Court Holding Terms at Seattle, Wash. Ter.
Territory of Washington Plaintiff vs William Spears et. al. Defendant.
For ______ Filed November 17th 1883 James Seavey Clerk. By James F. Cass Deputy Clerk.
